title: Remodeling? Relocating? Pac Heights Furnished Flat
posting_body: ['Remodeling?', 'Relocating?', 'Pac Heights Furnished Flat', '2068 Vallejo, San Francisco, CA 94123', 'FEATURES', 'Bedrooms:', '4', 'Bathrooms:', '3.5', 'Located on Floor #:', '1', 'Floors in Bldg:', '2', 'Square Footage:', '3880', 'Parking Spaces:', '2', 'Property Type:', 'Condo', 'Pets Allowed:', 'Cats & Dogs', 'Broker:', 'Pamela Kelley', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Available Furnished Only.', 'Breathtaking and majestic are just a few words to describe this rare opportunity to lease a sophisticated, San Francisco, three-level view home perfectly situated in the heart of Pacific Heights.', 'Renovated with only the finest materials and European fittings and fixtures, designed for entertaining and furnished for comfort, this home combines unique architectural features with traditional San Francisco elegance and luxury throughout.', 'Spanning 3880 square feet this three-bedroom, three-bathroom gem has a spacious layout incorporating an eat-in kitchen with small bone cabinetry, Wolf, Thermador and Subzero appliances, in-unit laundry and two-car parking equal the ultimate transitional housing.', 'The large living room has high ceilings and direct views of Alcatraz and the Bay.', 'The dining room features a vintage antique dining room table with seating for ten and French doors opening to the kitchen, dining room or hallway.', 'The kitchen is designed for those who love to cook, while enjoying expansive breathtaking views of the Bay.', 'The kitchen is well-appointed with oversized counters of dark granite, birds-eye maple artisan cabinetry, Sub-Zero Refrigerator, Thermador double-ovens with integrated convection and micro-wave, Wolf 4-burner range and grill and Miele dishwasher.', 'Adjacent to the kitchen and dining room is a light-filled breakfast room.', 'Leading to the second floor from the hallway and staircase is the spacious and private master bedroom with in-suite bathroom w/radiant heated flooring, generous closet space, large and private deck with a cozy seating area, gas grill and a self-contained mini urban garden.', 'The lower level boasts a small media room, bedroom with fabulous views, full bathroom, laundry room and garage.', 'Copyright © 2019 Home 2 San Francisco USA, Inc.', 'All Rights Reserved', 'RENTAL UNIT AMENITIES', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Washer/Dryer', 'Fireplace', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Patio', 'View', 'OTHER AMENITIES', 'High-Speed Internet', 'Microwave', 'OTHER PRICING DETAILS', 'Available Date:\xa0Oct 1, 2021', 'Deposit: $7,500', 'Included Utilities:\xa0Tenant Pays', 'Parking:\xa02-car garage included', 'CONTACT INFO', 'Pamela Kelley, Broker', 'show contact info', 'DRE# 01824381']
